questions.title: Close Down Inspection
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Have all signs/cones/barriers been removed from site?
Have any bagged signs been uncovered?
Have any temporary ramps been removed?
Has any temporary lining been removed and permanent lining reinstated?
Has the sign been left safe and clear for use by pedestrians and vehicles?
